name: Jungle Sniper Challenge
description:
The game provides to you a perfect animal shooting experience which you may not be able to get in real life. Shoot to the wild animals in this beautiful outdoor shooting adventure. Hunt all type of rainforest animals and become a real animal shooter.

Features:
1. Realistic 3d jungle environment
2. Realistic animals and their movement
3. Amazing sound effects
4. Different challenging missions
5. Sniper shooting experience
6. Challenging weather is a part of difficulty in the game
